title: shaaradha dhEviyE
sahitya:
shAradA dEviyE dhIrarin AviyE sharaNam gurudEvi tAyE



anupallavi



pUraNa vEdamE punita mei bOdhamE puNNiya pulavarellAm pOTruginra

jyOtiyE 



caraNam



punnagai pongiDum poli mukham kATTuvAi pUntaLirk-kaiyinAl tIntamizh UTTuvAi

annaiyE parishuddha cinmaya rUpiyE anbu malar koNDunadu ponpadam

vaNanginEn
